starSystems.name: Nebulon Prime
starSystems.description: A vibrant star system with twin suns, known for its rich mineral planets and advanced spacefaring civilizations.

celestialDestinations.name: Zephyria
celestialDestinations.description: A planet with vast oceans and floating cities.

celestialDestinations.name: Rogue's Veil
celestialDestinations.description: A dense asteroid belt rich in rare minerals.

celestialDestinations.name: Warp Gate to Vortexia
celestialDestinations.description: A warp gate that connects Nebulon Prime to Vortexia.

celestialDestinations.name: Warp Gate to Solara
celestialDestinations.description: A warp gate that connects Nebulon Prime to Solara.

celestialDestinations.name: Warp Gate to Ignis
celestialDestinations.description: A warp gate that connects Nebulon Prime to Ignis.

starSystems.name: Vortexia
starSystems.description: A mysterious system on the edge of a spiral galaxy, home to enigmatic phenomena and ancient secrets.

celestialDestinations.name: Shadowmere
celestialDestinations.description: A dark, enigmatic planet with a permanent twilight.

celestialDestinations.name: Vortexia Haven
celestialDestinations.description: A bustling interstellar trade hub at the edge of the vortex.

celestialDestinations.name: Warp Gate to Nebulon Prime
celestialDestinations.description: A warp gate that connects Vortexia to Nebulon Prime.

celestialDestinations.name: Warp Gate to Solara
celestialDestinations.description: A warp gate that connects Vortexia to Solara.

celestialDestinations.name: Warp Gate to Crysalix
celestialDestinations.description: A warp gate that connects Vortexia to Crysalix.

starSystems.name: Solara
starSystems.description: A system orbiting a small, yet surprisingly active dwarf star, renowned for its unique solar phenomena.

celestialDestinations.name: Luminara
celestialDestinations.description: A bright, sun-kissed planet with golden sands and clear skies.

celestialDestinations.name: Starwhisper
celestialDestinations.description: A comet emitting a mysterious, luminous aura.

celestialDestinations.name: Warp Gate to Nebulon Prime
celestialDestinations.description: A warp gate that connects Solara to Nebulon Prime.

celestialDestinations.name: Warp Gate to Vortexia
celestialDestinations.description: A warp gate that connects Solara to Vortexia.

starSystems.name: Crysalix
starSystems.description: A cold and remote system dominated by a giant ice planet and its moons, known for its breathtaking ice formations.

celestialDestinations.name: Frostridge
celestialDestinations.description: A frozen world with towering ice cliffs and deep blue crevasses.

celestialDestinations.name: Glacium
celestialDestinations.description: A small, icy moon with a network of subsurface oceans.

celestialDestinations.name: Warp Gate to Vortexia
celestialDestinations.description: A warp gate that connects Crysalix to Vortexia.

celestialDestinations.name: Warp Gate to Serenus
celestialDestinations.description: A warp gate that connects Crysalix to Serenus.

starSystems.name: Serenus
starSystems.description: A lush, verdant system with a rich diversity of life, home to the famous Serenus Gardens.

celestialDestinations.name: Verdantia
celestialDestinations.description: An idyllic paradise planet with sprawling jungles and serene lakes.

celestialDestinations.name: Pax
celestialDestinations.description: A peaceful moon with rolling hills and quiet valleys, a retreat for weary travelers.

celestialDestinations.name: Warp Gate to Crysalix
celestialDestinations.description: A warp gate that connects Serenus to Crysalix.

celestialDestinations.name: Warp Gate to Ignis
celestialDestinations.description: A warp gate that connects Serenus to Ignis.

starSystems.name: Ignis
starSystems.description: A volatile system with a young, active star and several volcanic planets, rich in minerals but dangerous.

celestialDestinations.name: Pyroclast
celestialDestinations.description: A world of molten lava seas and ever-erupting volcanoes.

celestialDestinations.name: Molten Ring
celestialDestinations.description: A dense asteroid belt heated by the nearby star, rich in valuable ores.

celestialDestinations.name: Warp Gate to Serenus
celestialDestinations.description: A warp gate that connects Ignis to Serenus.

celestialDestinations.name: Warp Gate to Nebulon Prime
celestialDestinations.description: A warp gate that connects Ignis to Nebulon Prime.
